text: "Electrolite" is a 1996 song by R.E.M. and is the third single from their 10th studio album New Adventures in Hi-Fi. It went to number 5 in Iceland, number 29 in the United Kingdom and number 96 in the United States. ==Track listing== All songs written by Bill Berry, Peter Buck, Mike Mills and Michael Stipe. #"Electrolite" – 4:05 #"The Wake-Up Bomb" (Live) – 5:07 #"Binky the Doormat" (Live) – 5:01 #"King of Comedy" (808 State remix) – 5:36 Category:1996 songs Category:1990s ballads Category:Rock ballads Category:R.E.M. songs Category:Radiohead songs Category:Alternative rock songs Category:Folk rock songs
title: Electrolite
